pkgmetadata.longdescription: Procedures Related to the Zadeh's Extension Principle for Fuzzy Data // Procedures for calculation, plotting, and approximation of the outputs for fuzzy numbers (see A.I. Ban, L. Coroianu, P. Grzegorzewski "Fuzzy Numbers: Approximations, Ranking and Applications" (2015)) based on the Zadeh's Extension Principle (see de Barros, L.C., Bassanezi, R.C., Lodwick, W.A. (2017) doi:10.1007/978-3-662-53324-6_2).
